src_original: ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bidhisattvānāṃ sambodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti,
tgt_original: 菩薩遵習六波羅蜜，能成佛慧無上正真。 「或有愚人口自宣言：

src_original: prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam,  kiṃ śeṣābhiḥ pāramitābhiriti ucyante /  te 'nyāḥ pāramitā dūṣayitavyā maṃsyante /
tgt_original: 『菩薩惟當學般若波羅蜜，其餘經者非波羅蜜，說其乏短。

src_original: tat kiṃ manyase ajita/
duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo 'bhūd yena kapotārthena śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni?
tgt_original: 本時國王所以持頭施與人者，為無智乎？

src_original: maitreya āha,
no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
bhagavān āha- yāni mayā maitreya/  bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitā-pratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni,  apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ?
tgt_original: 佛本所修六波羅蜜，所為至誠真實行乎。 」「為不行是得佛道耶？

src_original: maitreya āha no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
bhagavān āha- tvaṃ tāvad ajita/

ṣaṣṭikalpāna dānāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ,  ṣaṣṭikalpān śīlapāramitāyaṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān viryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ /
tgt_original: 「仁本宿世具六十劫行檀波羅蜜、尸羼惟逮，所修禪定、般若波羅蜜亦復如是，各六十劫。

src_original: prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam,  kiṃ śeṣābhiḥ pāramitābhiriti /  te 'nyāḥ pāramitā dūṣayitavyā maṃsyante /
tgt_original: 『菩薩惟當學般若波羅蜜，其餘經者非波羅蜜，說其乏短。

src_original: tat kiṃ manyase, ajita/
duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo 'bhūt,  yena kapotārthena śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni?
tgt_original: 本時國王所以持頭施與人者，為無智乎？

src_original: maitreya āha- no hīdaṃ bhagavan/  bhagavān āha- yāni mayā maitreya/
bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni /  apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ?
tgt_original: 佛本所修六波羅蜜，所為至誠真實行乎。 」「為不行是得佛道耶？

src_original: maitreya āha,
no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti /
tgt_original: 菩薩遵習六波羅蜜，能成佛慧無上正真。 「或有愚人口自宣言：

src_original: prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam,  kiṃ śeṣābhiḥ pāramitābhiriti /  te 'nyā mupāyapāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ manyante /
tgt_original: 『菩薩惟當學般若波羅蜜，其餘經者非波羅蜜，說其乏短。

src_original: tat kiṃ manyase, ajita/
duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo 'bhūd yena kapotārtha śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni?
tgt_original: 本時國王所以持頭施與人者，為無智乎？

src_original: maitreya āha,
no hīdam, bhagavan /  bhagavānāha- yāni mayā maitreya,
bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni /  apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ?
tgt_original: 佛本所修六波羅蜜，所為至誠真實行乎。 」「為不行是得佛道耶？
